title: Dialog
description: A dialog in the game A little game called Mario

has_item.description: Checks if the player has a specific item

occurence.description: The condition is true if the number of times the player has now seen this dialog matches this number.

custom.description: Check if a custom method returns true.

inverted.description: If the condition should be inverted.

text.description: The message the character says. Can contain an array of messages that will be displayed on after the other.

choices.description: The choices the player has the respond.

dialog.description: The dialog triggered by this choice.

condition.description: The condition that needs to be true to have this option be visible.

item.description: The item that the character gives the player after the dialog

event.description: The event that is triggered after the dialog

set_sprite.description: The the character should appear as after the dialog

label.description: A label that can be used with goto

condition.description: Only reach this dialog if this condition is true

true.description: The dialog to execute if the condition is true

false.description: The dialog to execute if the condition is false

goto.description: Go to the dialog with the defined label
